Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cardReleted.cards

Class CardInHand

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cardReleted.cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cardReleted.cards.CardWithCorners
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cardReleted.cards.CardInHand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldCard, ResourceCard
public abstract class CardInHand extends CardWithCorners
This class is the abstract class for the cards that are in the hand of the player
See Also:
